PHRASE.LANG:
Thanksgiving - Bundle

 (1) Animal Avatars - Thanksgiving - Turkey
 (2) Riding Turkey

 (6) Pilgrim Costume - Dress (Women)

 (10) Pilgrim Costume - Jacket (Men)
 (11) Pilgrim Costume - Pants (Men)
 (12) Pilgrim Costume - Shoes (Men) [#Legal]
